data.title: MASSIVE MINAS TIRITH SIEGE - Third Age Total War Gameplay
data.description:
Oh man!  I hope you have some snacks and drinks, because we have a long and epic battle!  Gondor is under siege by Rhun, Isengard, Harad, and Mordor.  Do they have enough manpower to hold the walls?  Or will the be destroyed?  Enjoy the Battle :D

IndyPride's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/milkandcookiesTW

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: SNOW AMBUSH - Life of a Soldier - Medieval Kingdoms Total War Gameplay
data.description:
Welcome to the very first video of Life of a Soldier. Today we are going to be following King Henry V of England.  He took his recent french bride to England to show her the land of England.  But of his way back to France he is ambushed by the French King!  Enjoy the battle :D  

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: FORTRESS UNDER SIEGE - Medieval 2 Total War Gameplay
data.description:
Welcome to another Siege battle in Medieval 2 Total war!  The Byzantine Empire and Lithuania are defending a fortress.  And the Holy Roman Empire, France, and Portugal are attacking!  enjoy the battle! :D

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: WALLS OF OSGILIATH - Third Age Total War Gameplay
data.description:

data.title: EPIC RIVER CROSSING BATTLE - Age of Vikings Total War Mod Gameplay
data.description:
Today we are back playing the Age of Viking mod for Total War Attila!  The Kingdom of Brittany and Northumbria are defending a very strategic river crossing.  The Byzantine Empire and Danelaw have massive armies ready to do battle!  Who will take victory? Enjoy :D

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: BOLD LAST STAND - Napoleon Total War Gameplay
data.description:
Welcome to one of my favorite Napoleon Battles I have played recently.  I command the United Netherlands, and my ally is Denmark.  Our two opponents are France and Austria.  This one comes to a explosive end! Enjoy :D

TheRyanKing's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/TheBloodyBayonets

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: GAME OF THRONES - Kings of Winter Total War Mod Gameplay
data.description:
Today Jackiefish and I are showing off a really cool Mod called Kings of Winter.  It is based of Game of Thrones, and is for Total War Attila  As of right now there is only one faction, which is house Stark and minor houses under their banner.  Enjoy the battle :D

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: BATTLE AT ARGONATH - Third Age Total War Gameplay
data.description:
Meeting at Argonath 3019AD - 

A hypothetical scenario where Saruman has reached out diplomatically to the easterlings..An agreed meeting is arranged on the River Anduin below the Argonath. Saruman sends one of his trusted new Uruk-hai to pass over his messages and a small clan of the easterlings is sent to pick them up & to discuss terms but rohan and the elves of lothlorien have heard about this possible alliance of the enemies forces and wish to disrupt such a event.
A small elven force travels downriver[by boat] and a rohan troops is dispatched to make sure that no agreements can be made.
For multiplayer a addition rule ..that if a isengard & rhun unit can remained undisturbed in the wagon circle for 10min without combat or missile fire interrupting them,then the enemy automatically win and agree a resolution of terms. If the units move out of the circle, or are attacked, or are hit by missile fire then the timer is reset and must begin again ...


Download Battle Here:
http://www.mediafire.com/download/flwe84u3yd2evuf/Meeting_at_argonath.rar

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: HEROIC RIVER CROSSING BATTLE - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Gameplay
data.description:
Kingdom of Sweden is under attack by the Duchy of Lesser Poland.  Sweden takes a strategic stand at a small river crossing to stop the invasion.  This is a battle of heroism for both kingdoms.  Enjoy the battle :D 

Alex's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/therambler146

data.title: INTENSE JUNGLE BATTLE - Napoleon Total War Gameplay
data.description:
